title: [FEATURE] Investigate not always building the native bits
body:
Today, each PR builds all the native platforms. 

We could probably be smart and only build them when they have changed. This is greatly speed up the builds - which spends 50 mins on all the native bits.

The XamarinComponents repo does this, so we could leverage some of that logic. 

Pretty much, all the bits required to determine whether to build is in:
 - externals/skia
 - externals/depot_tools
 - native
 - cake

Already the native bits cane be build without the bootstrapper using `dotnet cake`, so we could even move that to the skia repo. The shared cake is quite large, but the native bits only use a few functions.
